p:
Reference geometries and energies were obtained using DFT as implemented in FHI-Aims
46, 71 . Specifically, the PBE0 functional
72 was used with tight integration settings and tier-2 numerical atomic orbital basis sets. Dispersion interactions were treated via the pair-wise Tkatchenko-Scheffler van-der-Waals correction
73 . Approximate geometries were obtained with the UFF forcefield
61 .
